ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Update a Meeting
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Update a Meeting
ActivityMetadata.Description: Update the details of a meeting.This API has a rate limit of 100 requests per day. Therefore, a meeting can only be updated for a maximum of 100 times within a 24 hour window. **Scopes:** `meeting:write:admin` `meeting:write`
